_aChangeLog.text: Updated Collect Stage so failing will no longer reset your collection progress (due to a lot of requests)

_aLatestUpdates._sText: If you are going to run this map then there is no difference between v1 and v2, but v2 is better for causal play as you don't have to one-shot stage 6. Thanks to everyone for voicing their opinion on this stage and letting me know that I should change it, having to one shot it was definitley a bad idea for people who aren't speedrunning the map.

_sText:
The sequel to bhop_enlightened with a much better aesthetic as well as more varied and difficult gameplay. Around 5:30-6 min for a wr run, 10min+ casually, I also added a 30/40 sec strafe bonus for people that may not like the main map.

Thanks!
